mapper.select: select * from cookie c join site_account sa on c.site_account_id = sa.id join site s on sa.site_id =s.id where sa.site_id = 1 and c.enable_status = 1 and s.enable_status = 1 and sa.enable_status = 1 and sa.is_available = 1

select c.id from cookie c join site_account sa on c.site_account_id = sa.id join site s on sa.site_id = s.id where c.enable_status=1 and ( c.current_block_count > s.cookie_max_block_count or date_add(c.create_time,INTERVAL s.cookie_expire_timeout hour)> current_timestamp )
